scripts.prebuild: npm run clear:dist && npm run clear:serverless
scripts.delete:beta: npm run config:delete; npm run config:copy:beta && sls remove; npm run config:delete
scripts.delete:prod: npm run config:delete; npm run config:copy:prod && sls remove; npm run config:delete
scripts.deploy:beta: npm run config:delete; npm run config:copy:beta && npm run build && sls deploy; npm run config:delete
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run config:delete; npm run config:copy:prod && npm run build && sls deploy; npm run config:delete
scripts.domain:beta: npm run config:delete; npm run config:copy:beta && sls create_domain; npm run config:delete
scripts.domain:prod: npm run config:delete; npm run config:copy:prod && sls create_domain; npm run config:delete
